Moving to Jekyll

March 22, 2013

This is my first update here for a long time! There's a few reasons why I've not updated and the main one is because I had fell out of love with what I'd previously built. Wordpress was my CMS/blog platform of choice for a number of years and I'd spent an awful lot of my time learning the ins and outs of it. Over time I'd realised it wasn't for anyone elses benefit but my...
